# allowsColorSelection

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether to show the color selection UI for the tool.

## Declaration

```swift
var allowsColorSelection: Bool
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Customizing color

- **defaultColor**: The default color for the tool.
